tool_description: Compares forecast predictions against observed weather data to calculate accuracy metrics and identify systematic biases.

variable_type.description: Weather variable being validated: temperature, precipitation, wind, pressure, humidity

error_messages: Array length mismatch: forecast_values and observed_values must have the same length.
Insufficient data: Need at least 3 data points for meaningful validation.
Invalid variable type: Use one of [temperature, precipitation, wind, pressure, humidity].
Unsupported metric: Use standard validation metrics like mae, rmse, bias, correlation, skill_score.
usage: Provide forecast_values and corresponding observed_values with the variable_type. Optionally specify validation_metrics to calculate. Returns comprehensive accuracy assessment.

validation_summary.description: Summary of validation results and recommendations
